name: Day at the market
description:
Day at the Market

Just a casual day at the market!

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse Position - Aim Tongue
  • Left Mouse - Shoot Tongue
  • Mousewheel - Reel in tongue
  • Press L to reset

Team

  • Lead Programmer - Lorenz Gonsa
  • 3D Assets & Gamedesign - Martin Hatler
  • Gamedirector - Vincent Thierry
  • Sounds & Music - Daniel Wetzelhütter
